WAY overrated.  We made lunch reservations and despite coming earlier than the lunch crowd, our "reserved" table was in an awful spot, way in the back with no views even though there were plenty of open tables around us.  We felt service was not friendly and even condescending at times.  Cannonli was good but the rich man paella and the black ink paella were a little too salty and oily for us.  The prices were expensive for what we received.  Even though this is the oldest restaurant in Barcelona, there are way too many better restaurants elsewhere to waste your time here.
